summary: "The Shawshank Redemption" is a 1994 American movie about a banker, Andy Dufresne (Tim Robbins), wrongly sentenced to life in prison for murder. He befriends a fellow inmate, Red (Morgan Freeman), and helps the warden with money laundering. Despite critical acclaim and seven Academy Award nominations, the film didn't make much money at first. However, it became popular through VHS rentals, TV broadcasts, and word of mouth, eventually grossing over $73 million. Today, it's considered one of the most beloved films ever made and is preserved in the U.S. National Film Registry.
title: The Shawshank Redemption
